function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The presence of fewer than 100 cases of COVID-19 in some countries may lead to a false sense of security and reduce the urgency of implementing effective measures to mitigate the spread of the virus.","Impact":"Increased risk of uncontrolled spread of the virus and potential resurgence of COVID-19 cases in these regions.","Mitigation":"Undertake proactive testing, contact tracing, and public health measures to prevent complacency and ensure early detection of COVID-19 cases.","Technologies":"Testing and contact tracing technologies, public health surveillance systems.","People":"Residents and visitors in regions with fewer than 100 cases of COVID-19.","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Reliance on short-term aid measures may create dependency on government support and hinder long-term resilience and sustainability of SMEs and startups.","Impact":"Vulnerability of SMEs and startups to future crises and economic shocks if long-term resilience strategies are not developed.","Mitigation":"Encourage the development of sustainable business models, access to long-term financing options, and capacity building for resilience planning.","Technologies":"Business modeling tools, financial planning software, capacity building programs.","People":"SMEs, startups, and entrepreneurs.","Owner":"Business associations, financial institutions, and entrepreneurship support organizations."},{"Description":"Reduction in loan interest rates and loan availability may lead to increased borrowing and debt burden for SMEs and startups, potentially creating financial instability in the future.","Impact":"Financial vulnerability and potential insolvency of SMEs and startups due to excessive borrowing and debt accumulation.","Mitigation":"Provide financial education, mentorship, and guidance on responsible borrowing and debt management for SMEs and startups.","Technologies":"Financial education resources, mentorship platforms, financial management software.","People":"SME owners, entrepreneurs, and small business owners.","Owner":"Financial institutions, business support organizations, and mentorship programs."}]}
